title: Fighting the Devil: A True Story of Consuming Passion, Deadly Poison, and Murder
description: This true crime saga of death, abuse, embezzlement, poison, and premonitions may seem like the stuff of soap operas. However, this true and chilling thriller of a horrific, slow, painful murder and haunting occurrences actually happened.  Read this nail-biter with the lights blazing! Millionaire rancher discovers his wife and bookkeeper have stolen thousands of dollars from him. He demands the money back, but suddenly gets deathly ill and dies in the hospital from an unknown illness. The millionaire's ex-wife becomes a sleuth to help solve his murder. Two years later clues lead her to a bottle of arsenic in a storage locker. Can she now trace this poison back to the murderer?
author: Jeannie Walker
